content.title: Reading
content.description: Shakespear was a famous British poet. He is famous all over the world. Shakespear lived in the city Stratford-upon-Avon. Shakespears poems have been translated into many different languages. Shakespears grave is located in Stratford-upon-Avon. Every year on the 23 April, a commemoration is held.
